title: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers
content:
ain, which makes them think you’re a True Soul. You’ll have the following options to respond with:

I am not… a True Soul… Look to the Harpers you saved. Accept your fate. [STRENGTH] Rage against the vines. [WARLOCK] Beseech your patron to help you.

If you choose the fifth option, Mol will intervene and vouch for you. Jaheira will then question how you could have a tadpole but not be a thrall. You’ll have the following choices to answer the question:

Because of this artefact. (Show Jaheira) I
